title: NHM Punjab Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 60 Nurse Posts
description: The National Health Mission Punjab (NHM Punjab) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 60 Nurse Practitioners in Midwifery Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their GNM, B.Sc Nursing can apply for the NHM Punjab Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selecti...
